item.title: Paper plane
item.description:
Amaro Nonino is expensive so feel free to substitute for a similar (or different) amaro.

Ingredients

  • 20ml bourbon
  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist or miniature paper plane

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Spritz Veneziano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml prosecco
  • 45 ml Aperol
  • 20 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice
  • (garnish) olive

Instructions

Build in wine glass over ice. Garnish.
